basics.name: Marcus Rodriguez
basics.label: Senior UX/UI Designer
basics.summary: Award-winning UX/UI designer with 6+ years of experience crafting intuitive digital experiences. Specialized in user research, prototyping, and design systems. Passionate about creating accessible and inclusive designs that delight users.

work.name: DesignHub Inc
work.summary: Leading design initiatives for enterprise SaaS products.
highlights: Led redesign of flagship product, increasing user satisfaction by 45% (NPS score)
Established and maintained comprehensive design system used by 20+ designers
Conducted user research with 100+ participants, driving data-informed decisions
Collaborated with engineering team to ensure pixel-perfect implementation
Mentored 2 junior designers and led weekly design critique sessions

work.name: Creative Studios
work.summary: Designed web and mobile applications for diverse clients.
highlights: Designed mobile app for fintech startup, achieving 4.8-star rating on App Store
Created wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes using Figma and Adobe XD
Conducted A/B testing that improved conversion rates by 30%
Presented design proposals to stakeholders and incorporated feedback

work.name: Digital Agency Co
work.summary: Supported design team on various client projects.
highlights: Created marketing materials and landing pages for e-commerce clients
Assisted in user testing sessions and documented findings
Developed responsive website designs for small business clients

volunteer.summary: Providing design services for non-profit organizations.
highlights: Redesigned website for animal shelter, increasing adoption inquiries by 60%
Created brand identity for environmental conservation group
Hosted workshop on accessible design practices for local community

publications.name: The Future of Inclusive Design
publications.summary: Exploring how inclusive design principles create better experiences for all users, not just those with disabilities.

publications.name: Building Scalable Design Systems
publications.summary: A practical guide to creating and maintaining design systems that grow with your product.
